backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining order, user profile, authorization logic, and admin-restricted order management with storage and blob handling.
backend/old.mo: Legacy module containing earlier type definitions for orders, signatures, user profiles, and actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Comprehensive deployment guide explaining backend IC deployment and frontend cPanel hosting setup with configuration and troubleshooting.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache configuration enabling compression, caching, security headers, and MIME types for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Self-hosting guide detailing how to build and upload the frontend to cPanel and configure deployments.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements hash-based routing, authentication checks, and layout for the main app with navigation and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Admin form for viewing and updating payment contact status and notes with submit handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: Displays a card prompting the user to log in, explaining why authentication is required.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component allowing drawing, clearing, and emitting signature data URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Fetches and exposes whether the current authenticated user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks for submitting orders and fetching or updating order data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables with light/dark mode styling and global UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed admin view of a single order, including status badges, customer data, file previews, and payment contact controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows an admin order list with search, filtering, stats, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and informational feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders, supports viewing individual order details, and requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details and a payment contact modal after an order is submitted.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Implements the full order form with validation, ID info inputs, photo/signature upload, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Renders the pricing page with a main pricing card, feature list, and tiered pricing examples, allowing navigation to the order page.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Provides helpers to generate base-path-safe URLs for static assets and documents.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Offers client-side image file validation and conversion utilities.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Generates random names and addresses using predefined lists and simple randomization.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formats backend order timestamps and status enums into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and managing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a constant array of U.S. state abbreviations and names for use in dropdowns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including enabled features, new requests, and notes related to adding cPanel self‑hosting documentation and assets.
